function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for air quality in biophilic design may lead to the spread of airborne diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Integrate air purification systems and ventilation design to ensure high indoor air quality.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, advanced ventilation systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and facility managers."},{"Description":"Neglecting proper maintenance of plants in buildings can lead to the propagation of pests and disease-carrying insects.","Impact":"Risk of pest infestations and the potential spread of diseases carried by insects.","Mitigation":"Implement regular inspection and maintenance protocols for plants to prevent pest infestations and control disease-carrying insects.","Technologies":"Integrated pest management systems, plant monitoring technology.","People":"Maintenance staff, building occupants.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners."},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration for the selection of indigenous plant species may disrupt the local ecosystem and increase the risk of invasive species and diseases.","Impact":"Disruption of local ecosystem balance, potential spread of invasive species and diseases.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research on indigenous plant species and their impact on the local ecosystem before integration into building designs.","Technologies":"Ecological impact assessment tools, native plant species databases.","People":"Environmental scientists, landscape architects, building designers.","Owner":"Environmental agencies, building developers."}]}
